articles.title: Russian First Deputy FM and his Party Arrive
articles.content:
Russian First Deputy FM and His Party Arrive

					Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Andrey Denisov, first deputy foreign minister of the Russian Federation, and his party arrived here Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets New Nigerian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets New Nigerian Ambassador

					Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with new Nigerian Ambassador Maclean Igonikon Omuso who paid a courtesy call on him Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Tours Different Parts of Shanghai
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Tours Different Parts of Shanghai

					Shanghai, September 28 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Choe Yong Rim on a goodwill visit to China and his party visited different places of Shanghai Wednesday. 
					
					Choe Yong Rim and his party went round the Baoshan Steel Group, Bailian Xijiao Goods Purchasing Center and the Chinese Pavilion of the 2010 Shanghai World Expo. 
					
					After visiting the places Choe made entries in the visitor's books.
